# Water Quality {.unnumbered}

## Background

The water quality dashboard provides an in-depth view of water quality conditions in Tampa Bay, including a report card to assess annual trends by major bay segments. Additional features include an assessment of seasonal trends, site-level trends, and data downloads.   

## Dashboard

View the dashboard by visiting [https://shiny.tbep.org/wq-dash](https://shiny.tbep.org/wq-dash){target="_blank"}
